mentionArg1.extent: syracuse, new york, where a retired handyman admitted he held five women as sex slaves in an underground bunker over 15 years

Sentence: strange story coming out of syracuse , new york , where a retired handyman admitted he held five women as sex slaves in an underground bunker over 15 years. he pleaded guilty this morning to five counts of kidnapping. under a plea deal he could get 15 years to life. he was arrested in april for holding a girl hostage nearly seven months. the girl was kept in a two-room concrete dungeon he built under the background of his home near syracuse. after his arrest , police found four other women who said they were abducted and raped by him .
